alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 05 at 11:43AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...NARROW BANDS OF LOCALLY HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHENANGO...ONONDAGA... CORTLAND...AND MADISON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Narrow bands of locally heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to as low as a quarter to half mile. A quick additional fluffy inch or so of accumulation is possible, causing slick roads. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1138 AM EST, narrow bands of locally heavy snow were moving southeast at 25 MPH across the area. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Pompey, Otisco, Skaneateles, Marcellus, Preble, Scott, Truxton, Solon, Cincinnatus and Otselic. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 13 and 15. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
